trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Beaks
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage, or 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Piercing damage if the swarm is {@status Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Cacophony {@recharge}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 10}, one creature in the swarm's space. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Deafened|XPHB} condition until the start of the swarm's next turn. While {@condition Deafened|XPHB}, the target also has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks and attack rolls.
